posts.post_title: WTB: T206  Cobb Green Portrait  GOT ONE
posts.post_content: Looking for psa or sgc  fair to good.
Then proper etiquette is to start your own thread.

[quote name="1952boyntoncollector" post=1348511]not competing with the potential buyer..looking for different cards..and may attract more attention to both...if asking for the same card (like i did once but wont do again)i think thats an etiquette issue..

plus there should be more leeway dealing with WTB threads..then FS threads....

if you have a yardsale..wouldnt you be happy if theres a yardsale next door....?   not sure how that is an etiquette violation what i did on this thread...thoughts?[/QUOTE]


I am.  Peter is correct.
ok i started new thread...ill do as the romans do...
